## output

a tidy data set as txt file with 180 rows and 68 variables

## variables in the output

mean values by the activity level and subject 

6 activity levels and 30 subjects making 180 rows

68 column variables include 66 variables which are  mean values of various measures ; which would be used as features in further analysis. Subject and activity level are the other two variables.
